body: I am more surprised this isn't translated yet
Waiting for part 4
I keep waiting for translation in english. I love cyclone art and story.
I'm legit shocked that this isn't  translated anywhere yet when much longer and much worse titles get translated very quickly. I'm not asking for translations, it's just very bizarre.
@xeinlanzer yes i noticed it too, hayakawa really similar to girl #1 on Yume ka Utsusu
Part 4 pls
Waiting for some plot twist, I'm quite tired of normal ntr
Nice to see that Couple are in a loving relationship despite having a side girl. Now that's vanilla
I wonder if the main girl is gonna get pregnant
Is twintails gonna be dumb enough to let it loop? Or did the boyfriend not even tell her what was going on? That's what the beginning sort of looked like.
Okay so twin tail is gonna get some as well huh?
Dang plot twist time
i love cyclone art, the art is so tempting but i hate the story
i hope English sub. I dont understand story
The story are shit, but forget that, the art was amazing
And here I thought this series finished at part 2. Anyway, Cyclone has that pretty unique art, good shit.
ohoo nice still continue

Is it just me? That twin tail tennis girl named hayagawa who investigate what happened to kaori the heroine, appears in izumi reizei other hentai works named "yume ka utsutsu ka/is it dream or reality" at the end of page, as one of the hypnotized girls victim.

@ningask Thanks for the breakdown. If true, I'm shocked that she told the first boyfriend everything. Yeah she  could have said something sooner but in NTR stories, the main cunt usually gets caught or just never says anything so I give her minor props for that one. She failed slightly less hard than most..... really looking forward to the translation.

the last scene of this her agreeing to be the one guy's girlfriend or something like that.
also why's she in the soccer club? the answer is "my new friends suggested it to me because i suck a tennis now."
interested to see where evil chick goes with this story, also she told the first boyfriend everything, i think. so he's pretty disillusioned, thats what pg83 was about.
Bloody he'll
good fell in to dispair
awesome. TOP notch art and story. instant fav.
Next chapter the skit will break up with her bf and she will become a prostitute or an AV actress.

It still continue?? God damn... I thought she was just become a slave to the couple's. Turns out she become a slave to everyone in the club. I suspect she will get revenge and make the girl who make her into this into a slave as well. Can't wait for part 4
Finally, some armpit licking
Fuck yeah boys, cyclone fucking rocks
Wow there's a third? what did we do to deserve this greatness? yessss.
yesss
holy fuck, didnt think this has more. BLESS you Cyclone, Cant wait to see the end of this story :3
@Bzo1480 mm, your explanation makes sense, i was wrong, lmao... i was too focused on the "to be continued" part in the doujin that i made that wrong assumption,lol
@lacerinos123 "Kouhen" is usually used for the final chapter, so that just means the next chapter is the last.
Don't know why but to me the bodies and the faces don't match each other. Body seems like it came from some hyper realistic NTR hentai art while the faces came from some moe style vanilla hentai.

ini baru chapter dengan cerita NTR yg mantap . alur gang bang yg mantep juga

di tunggu karya selanjutnya , gak sabar

no, i mean...the author wrote using "kohan" which means "latter half", so maybe its like midareuchi 3 part 2 rather than midareuchi 4...
why is this still continuing

What a Shame
She really become slut who will open her legs to anyone
The art is good with full color but I prefer if she only sex with one guy

It'd be the fourth part, not second, lol. This is still funny because if she was as good as the story made her out to be at tennis, there's no way either her parents or the coach wouldn't have noticed something was up with her given she started skipping practice back in part 2.
the author even mentioned something like this in the comment section in his twitter: いつも応援ありがとうございます！　無事に完成させることできました♪　後半も頑張りたいです so probably we can expect 2nd part in the future?
Still continue??
